transcript.text:
￼












Set up Payment & Shipping Methods

2 min
payment methods while you are creating a fully functional online store, integrating multiple and safe payment methods is a crucial step in the process the payment methods (cheque, paypal, etc ) you have enabled will be displayed on the checkout page of your store and the customers can choose any of the methods to pay for their orders you can manage the payment methods from the admin panel >> store configuration >> payment methods screen shipping methods the way through which your customers will receive their orders also plays an important role you can configure and enable multiple shipping methods (flat, weight based, quantity based, 3rd party, etc ) that will be displayed in the storefront where the customers can choose between the best suitable options you can set up and manage your shipping methods from the admin panel >> store configuration >> shipping methods screen
Did this page help you?
